snippet: Nate Silver of FiveThirtyEight took questions Tuesday on the popular social news site Reddit’s “Ask Me Anything” section. What follows is an edited transcript, with the questions and answers sorted by subject.

headline.main: Transcript of Nate Silver's 'Ask Me Anything' on Reddit
